header.title: wxFontDialog

description.p: This class represents the font chooser dialog.
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxDialog wxTopLevelWindow wxWindow wxEvtHandler

desc.p: create/3 must be called before the dialog can be shown.
Pass a parent window, and the wxFontData object to be used to initialize the dialog controls.

func.fsummary: Creates the dialog if the wxFontDialog object had been initialized using the default constructor.

desc.p: Creates the dialog if the wxFontDialog object had been initialized using the default constructor.
Return: true on success and false if an error occurred.

func.fsummary: Returns the wxFontData associated with the font dialog.
